message.body: I'm alright, just very very tired. Where are you from?
I live in Philadelphia but in from Minnesota, actually. You?
You go to school in Philly? I live in NY
Just graduated from a masters program in physical theatre actually.
Physical theatre? never heard of that before. What is it? Yes actually I am.
It approaches theatre from the body instead of psychology or memory. What are you studying?
Wow. so you dance? I official declared my major For the first time for speech language pathology. I wanted to do Physical therapy then occupational
therapy....in all honesty I have no idea if this is what I want. Undergrad issues lol
In the end, you probably will end up doing something else too! That's just life.
I studied anthropology and I'm not an anthropologist, so in a way yes. But it's a big part of my artistic pursuits now - that mode of thougt I mean
Wow. Do you currently perform or take part in any productions?
I'm working with the pig iron theatre co on a show this summer and have a funk band.... Hah.
Funk band. Cool! What's the show about? Where does your funk band perform?
